Method.name: Main
Method.Implementation:
set (arg(1),arg(2),arg(3)) = 1 set arg=3 set StandartCallCount = ..GetCount(arg(1),arg(2),arg(3)) w "StandartCallCount: ",StandartCallCount,!
set NewCallCount = ..GetCount(arg...) w "NewCallCount: ",NewCallCount,!
set RefCallCount = ..GetCount(.arg) w "RefCallCount: ",NewCallCount

Method.name: GetCount
Method.Description: Get the number of pNode args
